name: Apocalypse Planner
description:
In this (definitely not sims 3 ripoff) title you will have to come up with ways to sustain yourself to survive the oncoming apocalypse! Wire circuits, generate power, drink your pee(what?) and farm your way to the end, but watch your budget!

The game features AND/OR/NAND gates (and more!) so you can truly go nuts with your creations. How long will you survive?

Did I mention we even made a radio station to keep you entertained?
